DOC.brief_summary: A single centre , open , randomize , placebo control , 3 period cross-over study evaluate effect single oral dos pioglitazone 45mg , rosiglitazone 8mg placebo urinary sodium excretion 12 healthy male volunteer
DOC.brief_title: A Methodological Study To Evaluate The Effects Single Oral Doses Of Pioglitazone 45 mg And Rosiglitazone 8 mg On Sodium Balance In Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Volunteers Body Mass Index 18.028.0 kg/m2 Exclusion Criteria Clinically relevant medical history
